Title: AN ACT TO AMEND PARAGRAPHS (E) AND (L), SUBSECTIONS A AND B OF SECTION ONE OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-NINE HUNDRED AND TWELVE, ENTITLED "AN ACT MAKING APPROPRIATIONS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Data:
[ Act No. 3955, December 01, 1932 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND PARAGRAPHS (E) AND (L), SUBSECTIONS A AND B OF SECTION ONE OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-NINE HUNDRED AND TWELVE, ENTITLED "AN ACT MAKING APPROPRIATIONS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Be it enacted by the Senate end House of Representatives in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Items one and two, paragraph (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve, under the caption "Albay" on page four are hereby suppressed.
Section 2. Item two paragraph (l) subsection B of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve, under the caption "Albay" on page thirty-five is hereby amended, to read as follows:
"2. For the Baybay-Malinao road ............................................ P5,000.00"
Section 3. Paragraph (l), subsection B of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby .amended by adding a new ho:n on page thirty-five under the caption "Albay". to read as follows:
"9. For the Libog-Salvacion road ............................................. P3,000.00"
Section 4. Paragraph (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby amended so that item two on page five under the caption "Batangas" shall read as follows:
"2. For the Pacifico-Sampa school, San Luis ............................ P2,500.00"
Section 5. Paragraph (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby amended so that item six on page eight under the caption "Bulacan" shall read as follows:
"6. For the barrio school of Loma de Gato, Marilao ................. P2,500.00"
Section 6. Paragraph (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby amended so that item five on page nine under the caption "Capiz" shall read as, follows:
"5. For the Banica Elementary School, Capiz ........................... P6,000.00" 
Section 7. Paragraph, (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby amended that item nine on page fourteen under the caption "Ilocos Sur" shall read as follows:
"9. For the domestic science building of Santa Catalina ............ P1,000.00"
Section 8. Paragraph (e) subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby amended so that item three on page seventeen under the caption "Leyte" shall read as follows:
Section 9. Paragraph (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby amended so that items one and two on page seventeen under the caption "Marinduque" shall read as follows:
"1. Fur the Napo Makapuyat school, Santa Cruz ................... P3,000.00
"2. For the Bugnuyan barrio school, Gasan ............................. 500.00"
Section 10. Item two, Paragraph (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve, page nineteen, under the caption "Nueva Vizcaya", is hereby suppressed and transferred to item one, paragraph (e), subsection A of section one, to read as follows:
"1. For the Bayombong Domestic Science School .............. P4,000.00"
Section 11. Paragraph (e), subsection A of section one of Act Numbered Thirty-nine hundred and twelve is hereby amended so that items forty and forty-one on page twenty-four under the caption "Pangasinan" shall read as follows:
"40. For the Basing Elementary School, Lingayen ............................ P1,000.00
"41. For the Santa Cruz Elementary School, Santa Maria ................. P1,000.00"
Section 12. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1a—àphi1
Approved, December 1, 1932.
